entry.title: STMCubeIDE USE_HAL_***_REGISTER_CALLBACKS
entry.summary: How to use register callback in STM32 HAL The simplest form of interrupt handling in the STM HAL library is to override __weak HAL interrupt handler function. (I assume that HAL_***_IRQHandler(...) means HAL drivers interrupt handler function with attribute __week, e.g. __weak void HAL_TIM_PeriodElapsedCallback(TIM_HandleTypeDef *htim) in stm32fxx_hal_tim.c file) // Example of handle output com...
